spec_data.Name: python2-django-threadedcomments
spec_data.Description:
Django-threadedcomments is a Django application which allows for the
simple creation of a threaded commenting system. It is flexible as well,
partly due to its use of the same facilities that any other Django
application would use.
This package provides Python 2 build of django-threadedcomments.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:41:11 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple yet flexible threaded commenting system for Django - Python 2 version
